channel.title: Changeling the Lost PbtA and Beyond: Gauntlet Blog
channel.description:
On the Gauntlet Blog I look at my *Changeling the Lost* hack as a start of a series figuring out which hacks are worth revisiting and revising. Includes a wealth of links to other CtL resources written by me.
Find that here: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/changeling-the-lost-pbta-and-beyond

item.title: Changeling the Lost PbtA and Beyond: Gauntlet Blog
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

On the Gauntlet Blog I look at my Changeling the Lost hack as a start of a series figuring out which hacks are worth revisiting and revising. Includes a wealth of links to other CtL resources written by me.

Find that here:

THE GAUNTLET

Changeling the Lost PbtA and Beyond

HEDGE MAGIC With the midpoint of the year coming up I'm starting to look at what things I really want to get done by the end of 2022. Part of that involves going back and looking at all of the game...
